events.title: Neal Francis With Wyatt Waddell
events.location: Madison, Wisconsin, United States Of America
events.description: Doors at 7pm | Show at 8pm CASHLESS VENUE - The Majestic Theatre services all credit and debit payments only. No cash accepted. Bags (max size 12" x 6" x 12") are allowed and will be searched upon entry. Exceptions will be made for necessary medical equipment and bags for nursing mothers. We encourage you to pack light with only the necessities to make the entry process as smooth as possible. All tickets are standing General Admission and are available on a first come first serve basis. Advance tickets can be purchased online or at The Sylvee box office. Once the doors have opened, if tickets are still available, they can be purchased at the Majestic Theatre.
